trans-unit.source: Provides the means to access and manage an in-process speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: Gir mulighet til å få tilgang til og behandle en kjørende motor for talegjenkjenning.

trans-unit.source: You can create an instance of this class for any of the installed speech recognizers.
trans-unit.target: Du kan opprette en forekomst av denne klassen av installert talegjenkjennere.

trans-unit.source: To get information about which recognizers are installed, use the static <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha informasjon om hvilke gjenkjennere er installert, kan du bruke statiske <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>metode.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>

trans-unit.source: This class is for running speech recognition engines in-process, and provides control over various aspects of speech recognition, as follows: - To create an in-process speech recognizer, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%2A> constructors.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen, er for kjører tale recognition motorer kjørende og gir kontroll over forskjellige deler av talegjenkjenning, som følger: - du kan opprette en kjørende tale gjenkjenner ved bruk av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%2A>konstruktører.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To manage speech recognition grammars, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A> methods, and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Grammars%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du vil administrere tale recognition grammars, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A>, og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A>metoder, og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Grammars%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Grammars%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To configure the input to the recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du vil konfigurere inndataene gjenkjenneren, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>, eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>metode.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To perform speech recognition, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du vil utføre talegjenkjenning, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>metode.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To modify how recognition handles silence or unexpected input, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du vil endre hvordan recognition håndterer stillhet eller uventet inndata, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>, og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To change the number of alternates the recognizer returns, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.MaxAlternates%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du vil endre antallet alternativer som returnerer gjenkjenneren, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.MaxAlternates%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.MaxAlternates%2A>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer returns recognition results in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenneren returnerer recognition resultater i en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: - To synchronize changes to the recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du vil synkronisere endringer i gjenkjenner, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer uses more than one thread to perform tasks.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenneren bruker mer enn én tråd til å utføre oppgaver.

trans-unit.source: - To emulate input to the recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: -Som emulerer inndata i gjenkjenner, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SpeechRecognitionEngine object is for the sole use of the process that instantiated the object.
trans-unit.target: SpeechRecognitionEngine-objektet er for eneste bruk av prosessen som startes objektet.

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> shares a single recognizer with any application that wants to use it.
trans-unit.target: Av derimot <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>deler en enkelt gjenkjenner med alle applikasjoner som ønsker å bruke det.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid kall <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Dispose%2A>før du slipper siste referanse til tale gjenkjenner.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the recognizer object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Ellers ressurser den bruker vil ikke bli frigjort før saneringsoppsamlingen kaller gjenkjenner objektets `Finalize` metoden.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> class using the default speech recognizer for the system.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> klasse bruker standard tale gjenkjenning for systemet.

trans-unit.source: Before the speech recognizer can begin speech recognition, you must load at least one recognition grammar and configure the input for the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Før tale gjenkjenner kan talegjenkjenning, må du laste inn minst én recognition grammatikk og konfigurere inndata for gjenkjenneren.

trans-unit.source: To load a grammar, call the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å laste inn en grammatikk kalle den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>metode.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: To configure the audio input, use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>
trans-unit.target: For å konfigurere de lyd, bruker du én av følgende metoder:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> class using the default speech recognizer for a specified locale.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> klasse bruker standard tale gjenkjenning for en angitt nasjonal innstilling.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows og System.Speech API godta alle gyldige språket land-koder.

trans-unit.source: To perform speech recognition using the language specified in the `CultureInfo` argument, a speech recognition engine that supports that language-country code must be installed.
trans-unit.target: Til å utføre talegjenkjenning på språket som er angitt i den `CultureInfo` argumentet, et motor for talegjenkjenning som støtter språket landskoden må være installert.

trans-unit.source: The speech recognition engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Talegjenkjenningsmotorer som fulgte med Microsoft Windows 7 fungerer med følgende koder for språket land.

trans-unit.source: - en-GB.
trans-unit.target: -en-GB.

trans-unit.source: English (United Kingdom) - en-US.
trans-unit.target: Engelsk (Storbritannia) - en-US.

trans-unit.source: English (United States) - de-DE.
trans-unit.target: Engelsk (USA) - Tyskland Tyskland.

trans-unit.source: German (Germany) - es-ES.
trans-unit.target: Tysk (Tyskland) - es-ES.

trans-unit.source: Spanish (Spain) - fr-FR.
trans-unit.target: Spansk (Spain) - Fransk-FR.

trans-unit.source: French (France) - ja-JP.
trans-unit.target: Fransk (Frankrike) - Japan.

trans-unit.source: Japanese (Japan) - zh-CN.
trans-unit.target: Japansk - zh-CN.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (China) - zh-TW.
trans-unit.target: Kinesisk (Kina) - zh-TW.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (Taiwan) Two-letter language codes such as "en", "fr", or "es" are also permitted.
trans-unit.target: Kinesisk (Taiwan) to-bokstav språkkoder for eksempel "no", "no" eller "a" er også tillatt.

trans-unit.source: Before the speech recognizer can begin recognition, you must load at least one speech recognition grammar and configure the input for the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Før tale gjenkjenner kan recognition, må du laste inn minst én tale recognition grammatikk og konfigurere inndata for gjenkjenneren.

trans-unit.source: To load a grammar, call the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å laste inn en grammatikk kalle den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>metode.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: To configure the audio input, use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>
trans-unit.target: For å konfigurere de lyd, bruker du én av følgende metoder:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The locale that the speech recognizer must support.
trans-unit.target: Den nasjonale innstillingen tale gjenkjenner må støtte.

trans-unit.source: None of the installed speech recognizers support the specified locale, or culture is the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: Ingen av installert talegjenkjennere støtter det angitte nasjonale innstillingene eller culture er den konstante kulturen.

trans-unit.source: Culture is .
trans-unit.target: Cultureis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> using the information in a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo"></xref> object to specify the recognizer to use.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> ved hjelp av informasjonen i en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo"> </xref> objektet for å angi aktiverer bruk.

trans-unit.source: You can create an instance of this class for any of the installed speech recognizers.
trans-unit.target: Du kan opprette en forekomst av denne klassen av installert talegjenkjennere.

trans-unit.source: To get information about which recognizers are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha informasjon om hvilke gjenkjennere er installert, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before the speech recognizer can begin recognition, you must load at least one speech recognition grammar and configure the input for the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Før tale gjenkjenner kan recognition, må du laste inn minst én tale recognition grammatikk og konfigurere inndata for gjenkjenneren.

trans-unit.source: To load a grammar, call the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å laste inn en grammatikk kalle den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>metode.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: To configure the audio input, use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>
trans-unit.target: For å konfigurere de lyd, bruker du én av følgende metoder:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The information for the specific speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Informasjon for den bestemte tale gjenkjenneren.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> class with a string parameter that specifies the name of the recognizer to use.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> klassen med en strengparameter som angir navnet på aktiverer bruk.

trans-unit.source: The token name of the recognizer is the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Id%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A> property of the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Token navnet på gjenkjenneren er verdien for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Id%2A>for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo>objektet som ble returnert av den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A>for gjenkjenneren.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get a collection of all the installed recognizers, use the static <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å få en samling av alle installerte gjenkjennere, kan du bruke statiske <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>metode.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before the speech recognizer can begin recognition, you must load at least one speech recognition grammar and configure the input for the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Før tale gjenkjenner kan recognition, må du laste inn minst én tale recognition grammatikk og konfigurere inndata for gjenkjenneren.

trans-unit.source: To load a grammar, call the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å laste inn en grammatikk kalle den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>metode.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: To configure the audio input, use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>
trans-unit.target: For å konfigurere de lyd, bruker du én av følgende metoder:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The token name of the speech recognizer to use.
trans-unit.target: Token navnet på tale aktiverer bruk.

trans-unit.source: No speech recognizer with that token name is installed, or recognizerId is the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenner ingen tale med dette navnet token er installert, eller recognizerId er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: recognizerId is .
trans-unit.target: recognizerIdis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the format of the audio being received by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter formatet for lyden som mottas av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To configure the audio input, use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>
trans-unit.target: For å konfigurere de lyd, bruker du én av følgende metoder:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The format of audio at the input to the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the input is not configured or set to the null input.
trans-unit.target: Formatet for lyd på inndata til den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> forekomsten eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis inndataene ikke er konfigurert eller satt til null inndataene.

trans-unit.source: Gets the level of the audio being received by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter krypteringsnivået lyden som mottas av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value 0 represents silence, and 100 represents the maximum input volume.
trans-unit.target: Verdien 0 representerer stillhet, og 100 representerer maksimale volumet.

trans-unit.source: The audio level of the input to the speech recognizer, from 0 through 100.
trans-unit.target: Lyd nivået på inndataene tale-gjenkjenner, mellom 0 og 100.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> reports the level of its audio input.
trans-unit.target: Starter når den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> rapporter krypteringsnivået lyd inndata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> raises this event multiple times per second.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>forårsaket hendelsen flere ganger per sekund.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: The frequency with which the event is raised depends on the computer on which the application is running.
trans-unit.target: Hyppigheten av denne hendelsen oppstår som avhenger av datamaskinen programmet kjører.

trans-unit.source: To get the audio level at the time of the event, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: For å få lyd nivået da hendelsen, bruker du <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A>egenskapen for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get the current audio level of the input to the recognizer, use the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevel%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å få gjeldende lyd nivå av inndataene gjenkjenneren, kan du bruke gjenkjenneren <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevel%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create an AudioLevelUpdated delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en AudioLevelUpdated representant, må du identifisere metoden som håndterer hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når det oppstår hendelsen, med mindre du fjerner representanten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelsesbehandlingen representanter [hendelser og representanter](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current location in the audio stream being generated by the device that is providing input to the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende plassering i lyd dataflyten som genereres av enheten som leverer inndata i <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The AudioPosition property references the input device's position in its generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen AudioPosition refererer til den angitte enheten plassering i den genererte lyd dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> property references the recognizer's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: Sammenligning av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>egenskapen refererer til den gjenkjenner posisjonen i inndataene lyd.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: Disse posisjonen kan være forskjellig.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the recognizer has received input for which it has not yet generated a recognition result then the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> property is less than the value of the AudioPosition property.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis gjenkjenneren har mottatt inndata har ikke der den ennå generert fører recognition og verdien for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>egenskapen er mindre enn verdien for egenskapen AudioPosition.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current location in the audio stream being generated by the input device.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende plassering i lyd dataflyten som genereres av den angitte enheten.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> detects a problem in the audio signal.
trans-unit.target: Starter når den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> oppdager et problem i lyd signalet.

trans-unit.source: To get which problem occurred, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: For å få problemet som oppstod, bruker du <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A>egenskapen for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create an AudioSignalProblemOccurred delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en AudioSignalProblemOccurred representant, må du identifisere metoden som håndterer hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når det oppstår hendelsen, med mindre du fjerner representanten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelsesbehandlingen representanter [hendelser og representanter](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the audio being received by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Får statusen for lyden som mottas av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The AudioState property represents the audio state with a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen AudioState representerer tilstanden lyd med et medlem av den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>opplisting.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>

trans-unit.source: The state of the audio input to the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Statusen for tale gjenkjenner lyd inndataene.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the state changes in the audio being received by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Starter når tilstanden endringene i lydsnutten som mottas av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To get the audio state at the time of the event, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilstanden lyd da hendelsen, bruker du <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A>egenskapen for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get the current audio state of the input to the recognizer, use the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å få lyd statusen for inndataene gjenkjenneren, kan du bruke gjenkjenneren <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about audio state, see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om lyd status, se den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>opplisting.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>

trans-unit.source: When you create an AudioStateChanged delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en AudioStateChanged representant, må du identifisere metoden som håndterer hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når det oppstår hendelsen, med mindre du fjerner representanten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time interval during which a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> accepts input containing only background noise, before finalizing recognition.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tidsintervallet som en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> godtar inndata som inneholder bare bakgrunnsstøy, før du fullfører gjenkjenning.

trans-unit.source: Each speech recognizer has an algorithm to distinguish between silence and speech.
trans-unit.target: Hver tale gjenkjenner har en algoritme å skille mellom stillhet og tale.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer classifies as background noise any non-silence input that does not match the initial rule of any of the recognizer's loaded and enabled speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenneren klassifiserer som bakgrunnsstøy noen ikke stillhet inndata som ikke samsvarer med den opprinnelige regelen for noen av gjenkjenneren lastet inn, og tale recognition grammars er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer receives only background noise and silence within the babble timeout interval, then the recognizer finalizes that recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Hvis gjenkjenneren mottar bare bakgrunnsstøy og stillhet i babble intervallet, fullfører gjenkjenneren recognition operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: - For asynchronous recognition operations, the recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> event, where the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true`, and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: -Gjenkjenneren opphøyer for asynkrone recognition operasjoner, den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>hendelse, der den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `true`, og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: - For synchronous recognition operations and emulation, the recognizer returns `null`, instead of a valid <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.
trans-unit.target: -For synkron recognition operasjoner og emulering, returnerer gjenkjenneren `null`, i stedet for en gyldig <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: If the babble timeout period is set to 0, the recognizer does not perform a babble timeout check.
trans-unit.target: Hvis babble tidsavbruddsperioden er satt til 0, utfører ikke gjenkjenneren babble tidsavbrudd kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The timeout interval can be any non-negative value.
trans-unit.target: Intervallet kan være en positiv verdi.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0 seconds.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0 sekunder.

trans-unit.source: The duration of the time interval.
trans-unit.target: Varighet for tidsintervallet.

trans-unit.source: This property is set to less than 0 seconds.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen settes til mindre enn 0 sekunder.

trans-unit.source: Disposes the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Disposes den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Disposes the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object and releases resources used during the session.
trans-unit.target: Disposes den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> objekt og versjoner ressurser som brukes i økten.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Emulates input of a phrase to the speech recognizer, using text in place of audio for synchronous speech recognition.
trans-unit.target: Emulerer inndata av et uttrykk tale-gjenkjenner, ved hjelp av i stedet lyd for synkron talegjenkjenning.

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> events as if the recognition operation is not emulated.
trans-unit.target: Tale gjenkjenner hever den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>hendelser som om recognition-operasjonen ikke er emulert.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>

trans-unit.source: The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case and character width when applying grammar rules to the input phrase.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenner som leveres med Vista og Windows 7 Ignorer bokstavtypen og tegn bredde når du bruker grammatikkregler på det angitte uttrykket.

trans-unit.source: For more information about this type of comparison, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> enumeration values <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> and <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om denne typen sammenligning, se <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>opplisting verdier <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>og <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: The recognizers also ignore new lines and extra white space and treat punctuation as literal input.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjennerne også Ignorer nye linjer og ekstra mellomrom, og behandler tegnsetting som litteral.

trans-unit.source: The input for the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Inndataene for recognition-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The result for the recognition operation, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the operation is not successful or the recognizer is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet for recognition-operasjon eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis operasjonen er fullført, eller gjenkjenneren ikke er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer has no speech recognition grammars loaded.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenneren har ingen tale recognition grammars lastet inn.

trans-unit.source: inputText is .
trans-unit.target: inputTextis .

trans-unit.source: inputText is the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: inputTexter en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Emulates input of specific words to the speech recognizer, using text in place of audio for synchronous speech recognition, and specifies how the recognizer handles Unicode comparison between the words and the loaded speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: Emulerer inndata for bestemte ord tale-gjenkjenner, ved hjelp av i stedet lyd for synkron talegjenkjenning, og angir hvordan gjenkjenneren håndterer Unicode sammenligningen mellom ordene og laste inn tale recognition grammars.

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> events as if the recognition operation is not emulated.
trans-unit.target: Tale gjenkjenner hever den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>hendelser som om recognition-operasjonen ikke er emulert.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer uses `compareOptions` when it applies grammar rules to the input phrase.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenneren bruker `compareOptions` når det gjelder grammatikkregler for det angitte uttrykket.

trans-unit.source: The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case if the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> value is present.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenner som leveres med Vista og Windows 7 Ignorer bokstavtypen hvis den <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>eller <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>verdien finnes.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer always ignores the character width and never ignores the Kana type.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenneren ignorerer alltid Tegnbredden og ignorerer aldri Kana-type.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer also ignores new lines and extra white space and treats punctuation as literal input.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenneren også ignorerer nye linjer og ekstra mellomrom, og behandler tegnsetting som litteral.

trans-unit.source: For more information about character width and Kana type, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om Tegnbredden og Kana-type, se den <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>opplisting.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: An array of word units that contains the input for the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: En matrise med ord enheter som inneholder de for recognition-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that describe the type of comparison to use for the emulated recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjonen av verdier opplisting som beskriver typen sammenligning skal brukes for Emulerte recognition-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The result for the recognition operation, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the operation is not successful or the recognizer is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet for recognition-operasjon eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis operasjonen er fullført, eller gjenkjenneren ikke er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer has no speech recognition grammars loaded.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenneren har ingen tale recognition grammars lastet inn.

trans-unit.target: wordUnitsis .

trans-unit.source: wordUnits contains one or more elements.
trans-unit.target: wordUnitsinneholder én eller flere elementer.

trans-unit.target: compareOptionsinneholder den , , eller flagg.

trans-unit.source: Emulates input of a phrase to the speech recognizer, using text in place of audio for synchronous speech recognition, and specifies how the recognizer handles Unicode comparison between the phrase and the loaded speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: Emulerer inndata av et uttrykk tale-gjenkjenner, ved hjelp av i stedet lyd for synkron talegjenkjenning, og angir hvordan gjenkjenneren håndterer Unicode sammenligningen mellom uttrykket og laste inn tale recognition grammars.

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> events as if the recognition operation is not emulated.
