trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> finalizes an asynchronous recognition operation of emulated input.
trans-unit.target: Starter når den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> fullfører en asynkron recognition operasjon i Emulerte inndata.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> method begins an asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Hver <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>metode som starter en asynkron recognition-operasjon.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> raises the EmulateRecognizeCompleted event when it finalizes the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>opphøyer EmulateRecognizeCompleted-hendelse når den fullfører den asynkrone operasjonen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> operation can raise the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> events.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>kan øke operasjonen i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>hendelser.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The EmulateRecognizeCompleted event is the last such event that the recognizer raises for a given operation.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen EmulateRecognizeCompleted er sist slik at gjenkjenneren opphøyer for en gitt operasjonen hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: If emulated recognition was successful, you can access the recognition result using the either of the following: - The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property in the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs> object in the handler for the EmulateRecognizeCompleted event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis Emulerte recognition var vellykket, du har tilgang til recognition resultatet ved hjelp av en av følgende: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>egenskap i den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs>objektet i et behandlingsprogram for hendelsen EmulateRecognizeCompleted.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property in the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizedEventArgs> object in the handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>egenskap i den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizedEventArgs>objektet i et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>hendelsen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: If emulated recognition was not successful, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event is not raised and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> will be null.
trans-unit.target: Hvis Emulerte recognition ikke ble fullført, den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>denne hendelsen oppstår og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>vil være null.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs> derives from <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs>er avledet fra <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizedEventArgs> derives from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizedEventArgs>er avledet fra <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When you create an EmulateRecognizeCompleted delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en EmulateRecognizeCompleted representant, må du identifisere metoden som håndterer hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når det oppstår hendelsen, med mindre du fjerner representanten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelsesbehandlingen representanter [hendelser og representanter](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval of silence that the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> will accept at the end of unambiguous input before finalizing a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir intervallet for stillhet som den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> godkjenner på slutten av utvetydig inndata før du fullfører en operasjon for gjenkjenning.

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer uses this timeout interval when the recognition input is unambiguous.
trans-unit.target: Dikterings-gjenkjenner bruker intervallet for tidsavbrudd når de recognition utvetydig.

trans-unit.source: For example, for a speech recognition grammar that supports recognition of either "new game please" or "new game", "new game please" is an unambiguous input, and "new game" is an ambiguous input.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel for en tale recognition grammatikk som støtter gjenkjenning av enten "ny Vær Prøv" eller "ny spill", "ny Vær Prøv" er inndata utvetydig og "nytt spill" er tvetydig inndata.

trans-unit.source: This property determines how long the speech recognition engine will wait for additional input before finalizing a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen bestemmer hvor lenge motor for talegjenkjenning skal vente på flere inndata før du fullfører en operasjon for gjenkjenning.

trans-unit.source: The timeout interval can be from 0 seconds to 10 seconds, inclusive.
trans-unit.target: Intervallet kan være fra 0 sekunder til 10 sekunder.

trans-unit.source: The default is 150 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: Standard er 150 millisekunder.

trans-unit.source: To set the timeout interval for ambiguous input, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Angi intervallet for tvetydig inndata ved bruk av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>

trans-unit.source: The duration of the interval of silence.
trans-unit.target: Hvor lenge for stillhet intervallet.

trans-unit.source: This property is set to less than 0 seconds or greater than 10 seconds.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen settes til mindre enn 0 sekunder eller større enn 10 sekunder.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval of silence that the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> will accept at the end of ambiguous input before finalizing a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir intervallet for stillhet som den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> godkjenner på slutten av tvetydig inndata før du fullfører en operasjon for gjenkjenning.

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer uses this timeout interval when the recognition input is ambiguous.
trans-unit.target: Dikterings-gjenkjenner bruker intervallet for tidsavbrudd under recognition-inndataene er tvetydig.

trans-unit.source: For example, for a speech recognition grammar that supports recognition of either "new game please" or "new game", "new game please" is an unambiguous input, and "new game" is an ambiguous input.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel for en tale recognition grammatikk som støtter gjenkjenning av enten "ny Vær Prøv" eller "ny spill", "ny Vær Prøv" er inndata utvetydig og "nytt spill" er tvetydig inndata.

trans-unit.source: This property determines how long the speech recognition engine will wait for additional input before finalizing a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen bestemmer hvor lenge motor for talegjenkjenning skal vente på flere inndata før du fullfører en operasjon for gjenkjenning.

trans-unit.source: The timeout interval can be from 0 seconds to 10 seconds, inclusive.
trans-unit.target: Intervallet kan være fra 0 sekunder til 10 sekunder.

trans-unit.source: The default is 500 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: Standard er 500 millisekunder.

trans-unit.source: To set the timeout interval for unambiguous input, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Angi intervallet for utvetydig inndata ved bruk av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: The duration of the interval of silence.
trans-unit.target: Hvor lenge for stillhet intervallet.

trans-unit.source: This property is set to less than 0 seconds or greater than 10 seconds.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen settes til mindre enn 0 sekunder eller større enn 10 sekunder.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> objects that are loaded in this <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objekter som lastes inn i dette <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Samlingen av <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time interval during which a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> accepts input containing only silence before finalizing recognition.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tidsintervallet som en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> godtar inndata som inneholder bare stillhet før du fullfører gjenkjenning.

trans-unit.source: Each speech recognizer has an algorithm to distinguish between silence and speech.
trans-unit.target: Hver tale gjenkjenner har en algoritme å skille mellom stillhet og tale.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer input is silence during the initial silence timeout period, then the recognizer finalizes that recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Hvis de gjenkjenner stillhet i perioden for tidsavbrudd for første stillhet, fullfører gjenkjenneren recognition operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: - For asynchronous recognition operations and emulation, the recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> event, where the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true`, and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: -Gjenkjenneren opphøyer for asynkrone recognition operasjoner og emulering den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>hendelse, der den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `true`, og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: - For synchronous recognition operations and emulation, the recognizer returns `null`, instead of a valid <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.
trans-unit.target: -For synkron recognition operasjoner og emulering, returnerer gjenkjenneren `null`, i stedet for en gyldig <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: If the initial silence timeout interval is set to 0, the recognizer does not perform an initial silence timeout check.
trans-unit.target: Hvis første tidsavbrudd stillhetsintervallet er satt til 0, utfører gjenkjenneren ikke en opprinnelig stillhet tidsavbrudd se.

trans-unit.source: The timeout interval can be any non-negative value.
trans-unit.target: Intervallet kan være en positiv verdi.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0 seconds.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0 sekunder.

trans-unit.source: The duration of the interval of silence.
trans-unit.target: Hvor lenge for stillhet intervallet.

trans-unit.source: This property is set to less than 0 seconds.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen settes til mindre enn 0 sekunder.

trans-unit.source: Returns information for all of the installed speech recognizers on the current system.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer informasjon for alle installerte talegjenkjennere i gjeldende system.

trans-unit.source: To get information about the current recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha informasjon om gjeldende gjenkjenner, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A>

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo"></xref> objects that describe the installed recognizers.
trans-unit.target: En skrivebeskyttet samling av <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo"> </xref> objekter som beskriver installert gjenkjennerne.

trans-unit.source: Synchronously loads a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Synkron laster inn en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer throws an exception if the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object is already loaded, is being asynchronously loaded, or has failed to load into any recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenner oppstår et unntak hvis den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektet er allerede lastet inn, asynkront lastes eller kan ikke laste inn alle gjenkjenner.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: You cannot load the same <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object into multiple instances of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke laste inn det samme <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektet til flere forekomster av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: Instead, create a new <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object for each <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance.
trans-unit.target: I stedet opprette en ny <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekt for hver <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>forekomsten.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is running, applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause the speech recognition engine before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a grammar.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du kjører gjenkjenneren, programmer må bruke <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>Hvis du vil stoppe motor for talegjenkjenning før innlasting av utlasting av, aktivering eller deaktivering av en grammatikk.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you load a grammar, it is enabled by default.
trans-unit.target: Når du laster inn en grammatikk, er den aktivert som standard.

trans-unit.source: To disable a loaded grammar, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil deaktivere en lastet grammatikk, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Enabled%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: To load a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object asynchronously, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ikke laste inn en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekt asynkront, bruker du den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The grammar object to load.
trans-unit.target: Grammatikk-objektet til å laste inn.

trans-unit.source: Grammar is .
trans-unit.target: Grammaris .

trans-unit.source: Grammar is not in a valid state.
trans-unit.target: Grammarer ikke i en gyldig tilstand.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously loads a speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn en tale recognition grammatikk asynkront.

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer completes loading a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object, it raises a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Når gjenkjenneren er fullført innlasting av en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektet, den opphøyer et <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarCompleted>hendelsen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer throws an exception if the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object is already loaded, is being asynchronously loaded, or has failed to load into any recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenner oppstår et unntak hvis den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektet er allerede lastet inn, asynkront lastes eller kan ikke laste inn alle gjenkjenner.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: You cannot load the same <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object into multiple instances of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke laste inn det samme <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektet til flere forekomster av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: Instead, create a new <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object for each <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance.
trans-unit.target: I stedet opprette en ny <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekt for hver <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>forekomsten.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is running, applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause the speech recognition engine before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a grammar.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du kjører gjenkjenneren, programmer må bruke <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>Hvis du vil stoppe motor for talegjenkjenning før innlasting av utlasting av, aktivering eller deaktivering av en grammatikk.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you load a grammar, it is enabled by default.
trans-unit.target: Når du laster inn en grammatikk, er den aktivert som standard.

trans-unit.source: To disable a loaded grammar, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil deaktivere en lastet grammatikk, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Enabled%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: To load a speech recognition grammar synchronously, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å laste inn en tale recognition grammatikk synkront, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: The speech recognition grammar to load.
trans-unit.target: Tale recognition grammatikk ikke laste inn.

trans-unit.source: Grammar is .
trans-unit.target: Grammaris .

trans-unit.source: Grammar is not in a valid state.
trans-unit.target: Grammarer ikke i en gyldig tilstand.

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous operation was canceled.
trans-unit.target: Den asynkrone operasjonen ble avbrutt.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> finishes the asynchronous loading of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Starter når den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> avsluttes asynkron innlasting av en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method initiates an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenneren <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>metode som starter en asynkron operasjon.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> raises this event when it completes the operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>forårsaket hendelsen når operasjonen er fullført.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: To get the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object that the recognizer loaded, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs.Grammar%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Å hente <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektet som gjenkjenneren lastet inn, bruker du <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs.Grammar%2A>egenskapen for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs.Grammar%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: To get the current <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects the recognizer has loaded, use the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Grammars%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Å hente gjeldende <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekter i gjenkjenner har lastet inn, bruker du gjenkjenner <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Grammars%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Grammars%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is running, applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause the speech recognition engine before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a grammar.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du kjører gjenkjenneren, programmer må bruke <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>Hvis du vil stoppe motor for talegjenkjenning før innlasting av utlasting av, aktivering eller deaktivering av en grammatikk.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a LoadGrammarCompleted delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en LoadGrammarCompleted representant, må du identifisere metoden som håndterer hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når det oppstår hendelsen, med mindre du fjerner representanten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelsesbehandlingen representanter [hendelser og representanter](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of alternate recognition results that the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> returns for each recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir det maksimale antallet alternative resultater som den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> returnerer for hver recognition-operasjon.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> class contains the collection of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> objects that represent possible interpretations of the input.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>klassen inneholder samlingen av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>objekter som representerer mulige interpretations av inndataene.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value for MaxAlternates is 10.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for MaxAlternates er 10.

trans-unit.source: The number of alternate results to return.
trans-unit.target: Antall alternativ resultatene skal returneres.

trans-unit.source: MaxAlternates is set to a value less than 0.
trans-unit.target: MaxAlternates er satt til en verdi mindre enn 0.

trans-unit.source: Returns the values of settings for the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer verdiene for innstillingene for gjenkjenneren.

trans-unit.source: Recognizer settings can contain string, 64-bit integer, or memory address data.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenner innstillinger kan inneholde streng, 64-biters heltall eller minne adressedata.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the settings that are defined for a Microsoft Speech API (SAPI)-compliant recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor beskriver innstillingene som er definert for en Microsoft tale API (uspesifiserte ISAPI)-kompatibel gjenkjenner.

trans-unit.source: The following settings must have the same range for each recognizer that supports the setting.
trans-unit.target: Følgende innstillinger må ha samme område for hver gjenkjenner som støtter innstillingen.

trans-unit.source: A SAPI-compliant recognizer is not required to support these settings and can support other settings.
trans-unit.target: En uspesifiserte ISAPI-kompatibel gjenkjenner kreves ikke støtter disse innstillingene og støtter andre innstillinger.

trans-unit.source: |Name|Description| |----------|-----------------| |`ResourceUsage`|Specifies the recognizer's CPU consumption.
trans-unit.target: | Navnet | Beskrivelse | |----------|-----------------| | `ResourceUsage`| Angir den gjenkjenner CPU-bruk.

trans-unit.source: The range is from 0 to 100.
trans-unit.target: Området er fra 0 til 100.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 50.| |`ResponseSpeed`|Indicates the length of silence at the end of unambiguous input before the speech recognizer completes a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 50. | | `ResponseSpeed`| Angir hvor lang stillhet på slutten av utvetydig inndata før tale gjenkjenner er en operasjon for gjenkjenning.

trans-unit.source: The range is from 0 to 10,000 milliseconds (ms).
trans-unit.target: Området er fra 0 til 10 000 millisekunder (ms).

trans-unit.source: This setting corresponds to the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne innstillingen tilsvarer gjenkjenneren <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Default = 150ms.| |`ComplexResponseSpeed`|Indicates the length of silence at the end of ambiguous input before the speech recognizer completes a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Standard = 150 MS. | | `ComplexResponseSpeed`| Angir hvor lang stillhet på slutten av tvetydig inndata før tale gjenkjenner er en operasjon for gjenkjenning.

trans-unit.source: The range is from 0 to 10,000ms.
trans-unit.target: Området er fra 0 til 10,000ms.

trans-unit.source: This setting corresponds to the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne innstillingen tilsvarer gjenkjenneren <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>

trans-unit.source: Default = 500ms.| |`AdaptationOn`|Indicates whether adaptation of the acoustic model is ON (value = `1`) or OFF (value = `0`).
trans-unit.target: Standard = 500ms. | | `AdaptationOn`| Angir om tilpasning av akustisk modellen er ON (verdi = `1`) eller OFF (verdi = `0`).

trans-unit.source: The default value is `1` (ON).| |`PersistedBackgroundAdaptation`|Indicates whether background adaptation is ON (value = `1`) or OFF (value = `0`), and persists the setting in the registry.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er `1` (på). | | `PersistedBackgroundAdaptation`| Angir om bakgrunnen tilpasning er ON (verdi = `1`) eller OFF (verdi = `0`), og fortsetter innstillingen i registret.

trans-unit.source: The default value is `1` (ON).| To update a setting for the recognizer, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er `1` (på). | Du kan oppdatere en innstilling for gjenkjenneren ved bruk av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the setting to return.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på innstillingen skal returneres.

trans-unit.source: The value of the setting.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for innstillingen.

trans-unit.source: settingName is .
trans-unit.target: settingNameis .

trans-unit.source: settingName is the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: settingNameer en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: The recognizer does not have a setting by that name.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenneren har ikke en innstilling med dette navnet.

trans-unit.source: Performs a synchronous speech recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Utfører en operasjon for synkron talegjenkjenning.

trans-unit.source: This method performs a single recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden utfører en operasjon for enkelt gjenkjenning.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer performs this operation against its loaded and enabled speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenneren utfører operasjonen mot de innlastede og aktivert tale recognition grammars.

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the recognizer can raise the following events: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>.
trans-unit.target: Under et kall til denne metoden, kan gjenkjenneren øke følgende hendelser:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the recognizer detects input that it can identify as speech.
trans-unit.target: Starter når gjenkjenneren oppdager inndata som den kan identifisere som tale.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>

trans-unit.source: Raised when input creates an ambiguous match with one of the active grammars.
trans-unit.target: Starter når inndataene oppretter en tvetydig samsvarer med en aktiv grammars.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the recognizer finalizes a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Starter når gjenkjenneren fullfører en operasjon for gjenkjenning.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer does not raise the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> event when using this method.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenneren ikke heve den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>hendelsen ved bruk av denne metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The Recognize method returns a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object, or `null` if the operation is not successful.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenn metoden returnerer en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>objektet eller `null` Hvis det ikke lykkes.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: A synchronous recognition operation can fail for the following reasons: - Speech is not detected before the timeout intervals expire for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: En operasjon for synkron recognition kan mislykkes av følgende årsaker:-tale oppdages ikke før det utløper intervallene for tidsavbrudd den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The recognition engine detects speech but finds no matches in any of its loaded and enabled <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: -Recognition motoren finner tale, men finner ingen samsvar i noen av de innlastede og aktivert <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekter.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: To perform asynchronous recognition, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil utføre asynkrone recognition, bruk av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The recognition result for the input, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the operation is not successful or the recognizer is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenning resultatet for inndata, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis operasjonen er fullført, eller gjenkjenneren ikke er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: Performs a synchronous speech recognition operation with a specified initial silence timeout period.
trans-unit.target: Utfører en operasjon for synkron tale recognition med en angitt første stillhet tidsavbruddsperioden.

trans-unit.source: If the speech recognition engine detects speech within the time interval specified by `initialSilenceTimeout` argument, Recognize performs a single recognition operation and then terminates.
trans-unit.target: Hvis motor for talegjenkjenning oppdager tale i tidsintervallet angitt av `initialSilenceTimeout` argumentet, Gjenkjenn utfører en operasjon for enkelt recognition og avsluttes.

trans-unit.source: The `initialSilenceTimeout` parameter supersedes the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den `initialSilenceTimeout` parameteren erstatter gjenkjenneren <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the recognizer can raise the following events: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>.
trans-unit.target: Under et kall til denne metoden, kan gjenkjenneren øke følgende hendelser:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the recognizer detects input that it can identify as speech.
trans-unit.target: Starter når gjenkjenneren oppdager inndata som den kan identifisere som tale.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>

trans-unit.source: Raised when input creates an ambiguous match with one of the active grammars.
trans-unit.target: Starter når inndataene oppretter en tvetydig samsvarer med en aktiv grammars.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the recognizer finalizes a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Starter når gjenkjenneren fullfører en operasjon for gjenkjenning.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer does not raise the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> event when using this method.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenneren ikke heve den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>hendelsen ved bruk av denne metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize> method returns a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object, or `null` if the operation is not successful.

trans-unit.target: En operasjon for synkron recognition kan mislykkes av følgende årsaker:-tale oppdages ikke før det utløper intervallene for tidsavbrudd den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>eller den `initialSilenceTimeout` parameteren.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The recognition engine detects speech but finds no matches in any of its loaded and enabled <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.

trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil utføre asynkrone recognition, bruk av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The interval of time a speech recognizer accepts input containing only silence before finalizing recognition.
trans-unit.target: Tidsintervallet en tale gjenkjenner godtar inndata som inneholder bare stillhet før du fullfører gjenkjenning.

trans-unit.source: The recognition result for the input, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the operation is not successful or the recognizer is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenning resultatet for inndata, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis operasjonen er fullført, eller gjenkjenneren ikke er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: Performs a single, asynchronous speech recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Utfører en enkelt, asynkrone tale recognition operasjon.

trans-unit.source: This method performs a single, asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden utfører en operasjon for enkel, asynkrone gjenkjenning.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer performs the operation against its loaded and enabled speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenneren utfører operasjonen mot de innlastede og aktivert tale recognition grammars.

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the recognizer can raise the following events: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the recognizer finalizes a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Starter når gjenkjenneren fullfører en operasjon for gjenkjenning.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Raised when a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> operation finishes.
trans-unit.target: Starter når en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>operasjonen er fullført.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the result of an asynchronous recognition operation, attach an event handler to the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: For å hente resultatet av en asynkron recognition-operasjon, legge ved en hendelsesbehandling gjenkjenneren <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>hendelsen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises this event whenever it successfully completes a synchronous or asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenneren opphøyer denne hendelsen når den er en recognition synkron eller asynkron operasjon ble fullført.

trans-unit.source: If recognition was not successful, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property on <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> object, which you can access in the handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> event, will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis recognition ikke ble fullført, den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>-objektet som kan åpnes i et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>hendelsen blir `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: To perform synchronous recognition, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Du utfører synkron recognition ved bruk av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Performs one or more asynchronous speech recognition operations.
trans-unit.target: Utfører en eller flere asynkrone tale recognition operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: If `mode` is <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeMode>, the recognizer continues performing asynchronous recognition operations until the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncCancel%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncStop%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `mode` er <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeMode>, gjenkjenneren fortsetter å utføre asynkron recognition operasjoner før den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncCancel%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncStop%2A>-metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncStop%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncCancel%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeMode>

trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>

trans-unit.target: Starter når gjenkjenneren fullfører en operasjon for gjenkjenning.

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the result of an asynchronous recognition operation, attach an event handler to the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: For å hente resultatet av en asynkron recognition-operasjon, legge ved en hendelsesbehandling gjenkjenneren <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>hendelsen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises this event whenever it successfully completes a synchronous or asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenneren opphøyer denne hendelsen når den er en recognition synkron eller asynkron operasjon ble fullført.

trans-unit.target: Hvis recognition ikke ble fullført, den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>-objektet som kan åpnes i et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>hendelsen blir `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.target: En asynkron recognition operasjon kan mislykkes av følgende årsaker:-tale oppdages ikke før det utløper intervallene for tidsavbrudd den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>
