trans-unit.source: To perform synchronous recognition, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Du utfører synkron recognition ved bruk av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether to perform one or multiple recognition operations.
trans-unit.target: Angir om å utføre operasjoner for én eller flere gjenkjenning.

trans-unit.source: Terminates asynchronous recognition without waiting for the current recognition operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: Avslutter asynkrone recognition uten å vente på den gjeldende recognition operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: This method immediately finalizes asynchronous recognition.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden fullfører umiddelbart asynkrone gjenkjenning.

trans-unit.source: If the current asynchronous recognition operation is receiving input, the input is truncated and the operation completes with the existing input.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den gjeldende operasjonen er asynkron recognition mottar inndataene, inndataene avkortes operasjonen er fullført med de eksisterende

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> event when an asynchronous operation is canceled, and sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenner hever den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted>-hendelse når en asynkron operasjon er avbrutt, og angir de <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A>for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>til `true`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: This method cancels asynchronous operations initiated by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden avbryter asynkrone operasjoner startet av den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: To stop asynchronous recognition without truncating the input, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncStop%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil stoppe asynkrone recognition uten avkorte inndataene, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncStop%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncStop%2A>

trans-unit.source: Stops asynchronous recognition after the current recognition operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Stopper asynkrone recognition etter at den gjeldende recognition-operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: This method finalizes asynchronous recognition without truncating input.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden fullfører asynkrone recognition uten avkorte inndata.

trans-unit.source: If the current asynchronous recognition operation is receiving input, the recognizer continues accepting input until the current recognition operation is completed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den gjeldende operasjonen er asynkron recognition mottar inndataene, fortsetter du gjenkjenner godtar inndataene før gjeldende recognition operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> event when an asynchronous operation is stopped, and sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenner hever den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted>-hendelse når en asynkron operasjon er stoppet, og angir de <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A>for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>til `true`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: This method stops asynchronous operations initiated by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden stopper asynkrone operasjoner startet av den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: To immediately cancel asynchronous recognition with only the existing input, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncCancel%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte asynkrone recognition med bare de eksisterende umiddelbart, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncCancel%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncCancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> finalizes an asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Starter når den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> fullfører en asynkron recognition-operasjon.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> method initiates an asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>objektets <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>metode som starter en asynkron recognition-operasjon.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer finalizes the asynchronous operation, it raises this event.
trans-unit.target: Når gjenkjenneren fullfører den asynkrone operasjonen, viser denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Using the handler for the RecognizeCompleted event, you can access the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> in the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruker for hendelsen RecognizeCompleted, får du tilgang til den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>i den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: If recognition was not successful, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis recognition ikke var vellykket, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>blir `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a timeout or an interruption in audio input caused recognition to fail, you can access the properties for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InputStreamEnded%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Du har tilgang til egenskapene for å fastslå om et tidsavbrudd eller avbrudd i inndata forårsaket recognition mislykkes, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A>, eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InputStreamEnded%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InputStreamEnded%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> class for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>klasse for mer informasjon.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To obtain details on the best rejected recognition candidates, attach a handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha informasjon om beste avviste recognition kandidater koble til et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>hendelsen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>

trans-unit.source: When you create a RecognizeCompleted delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en RecognizeCompleted representant, må du identifisere metoden som håndterer hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når det oppstår hendelsen, med mindre du fjerner representanten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelsesbehandlingen representanter [hendelser og representanter](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current location of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> in the audio input that it is processing.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende plassering i den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> i lyd inndataene behandling.

trans-unit.source: The audio position is specific to each speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Lyd posisjonen er spesifikk for hver tale gjenkjenner.

trans-unit.source: The zero value of an input stream is established when it is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Nullverdi for en inndatastrømmen etableres når den er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: The RecognizerAudioPosition property references the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: RecognizerAudioPosition egenskapen referanser i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>objektets posisjonen i inndataene lyd.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A> property references the input device's position in its generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Sammenligning av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A>egenskapen refererer til den angitte enheten plassering i den genererte lyd-dataflyten.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: Disse posisjonen kan være forskjellig.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the recognizer has received input for which it has not yet generated a recognition result then the value of the RecognizerAudioPosition property is less than the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis gjenkjenneren har mottatt inndata har ikke der den ennå generert fører recognition og verdien for egenskapen RecognizerAudioPosition er mindre enn verdien for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The position of the recognizer in the audio input that it is processing.
trans-unit.target: Posisjonen til gjenkjenneren i lyd inndataene behandling.

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the current instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter informasjon om den gjeldende forekomsten av <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To get information about all of the installed speech recognizers for the current system, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha informasjon om alle installerte talegjenkjennere gjeldende system, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Information about the current speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Informasjon om gjeldende tale gjenkjenner.

trans-unit.source: Raised when a running <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> pauses to accept modifications.
trans-unit.target: Starter når en løpende <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> stanses midlertidig godtar endringer.

trans-unit.source: Applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause a running instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> before modifying its settings or its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: Programmer må bruke <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>Hvis du vil stoppe en forekomst av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>før du kan endre innstillingene eller tilhørende <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekter.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> raises this event when it is ready to accept modifications.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>forårsaket hendelsen når den er klar til å godta endringer.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: For example, while the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> is paused, you can load, unload, enable, and disable <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects, and modify values for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel da den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>er satt på pause, du kan laste inn, fjerner du, aktivere og deaktivere <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekter, og endre verdier for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a RecognizerUpdateReached delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en RecognizerUpdateReached representant, må du identifisere metoden som håndterer hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når det oppstår hendelsen, med mindre du fjerner representanten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelsesbehandlingen representanter [hendelser og representanter](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Requests that the recognizer pauses to update its state.
trans-unit.target: Forespørsler som gjenkjenneren stopper midlertidig for å oppdatere tilstanden.

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached> event, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Når gjenkjenneren genererer den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached>hendelsen i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A>-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs>er `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached>

trans-unit.source: To provide a user token, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å gi et brukertoken, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>metode.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify an audio position offset, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi en forskyvning lyd posisjonen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Requests that the recognizer pauses to update its state and provides a user token for the associated event.
trans-unit.target: Forespørsler som i gjenkjenner stopper midlertidig for å oppdatere tilstanden og gir et brukertoken for tilknyttede hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached> event, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> contains the value of the `userToken` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Når gjenkjenneren genererer den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached>hendelsen i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A>-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs>inneholder verdien for den `userToken` parameteren.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached>

trans-unit.source: To specify an audio position offset, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi en forskyvning lyd posisjonen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: User-defined information that contains information for the operation.
trans-unit.target: Brukerdefinerte informasjon som inneholder informasjon for operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Requests that the recognizer pauses to update its state and provides an offset and a user token for the associated event.
trans-unit.target: Forespørsler som i gjenkjenner stopper midlertidig for å oppdatere tilstanden og leverer en forskyvning og et brukertoken for tilknyttede hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer does not initiate the recognizer update request until the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> equals the current <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A> plus `audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate`.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenneren ikke starte oppdateringsforespørsel gjenkjenner før gjenkjenneren <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>er lik gjeldende <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A>plus `audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached> event, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> contains the value of the `userToken` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Når gjenkjenneren genererer den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached>hendelsen i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A>-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs>inneholder verdien for den `userToken` parameteren.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached>

trans-unit.source: User-defined information that contains information for the operation.
trans-unit.target: Brukerdefinerte informasjon som inneholder informasjon for operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The offset from the current <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition*> to delay the request.
trans-unit.target: Forskyvningen fra gjeldende <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition*>å utsette forespørselen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition*>

trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object to receive input from an audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurerer den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> objekt for å motta inndata fra en lyd-dataflyt.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer reaches the end of the input stream during a recognition operation, the recognition operation finalizes with the available input.
trans-unit.target: Hvis gjenkjenneren når slutten av inndataflyten under en recognition-operasjon, fullfører recognition operasjonen med de tilgjengelige.

trans-unit.source: Any subsequent recognition operations can generate an exception, unless you update the input to the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Noen senere gjenkjenning operasjoner kan generere et unntak med mindre du oppdaterer inndataene gjenkjenneren.

trans-unit.source: The audio input stream.
trans-unit.target: Lyd inndataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The format of the audio input.
trans-unit.target: Formatet for lyd inndataene.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object to receive input from the default audio device.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurerer den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> objekt for å motta inndata fra lyd standardenheten.

trans-unit.source: Disables the input to the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Deaktiverer inndataene tale gjenkjenner.

trans-unit.source: Configure the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object for no input when using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods, or when taking a recognition engine temporarily off line.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurer den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>objekt for inndata ved den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>metoder, eller når du tar en recognition motor midlertidig frakoblet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object to receive input from a Waveform audio format (.wav) file.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurerer den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> objekt for å motta inndata fra en fil med Waveform lyd format (WAV).

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer reaches the end of the input file during a recognition operation, the recognition operation finalizes with the available input.
trans-unit.target: Hvis gjenkjenneren når slutten av inndatafilen under en recognition-operasjon, fullfører recognition operasjonen med de tilgjengelige.

trans-unit.source: Any subsequent recognition operations can generate an exception, unless you update the input to the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Noen senere gjenkjenning operasjoner kan generere et unntak med mindre du oppdaterer inndataene gjenkjenneren.

trans-unit.source: The path of the file to use as input.
trans-unit.target: Banen til filen som skal brukes som inndata.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object to receive input from a stream that contains Waveform audio format (.wav) data.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurerer den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> objekt for å motta inndata fra en dataflyt som inneholder Waveform formatet (WAV) data.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer reaches the end of the input stream during a recognition operation, the recognition operation finalizes with the available input.
trans-unit.target: Hvis gjenkjenneren når slutten av inndataflyten under en recognition-operasjon, fullfører recognition operasjonen med de tilgjengelige.

trans-unit.source: Any subsequent recognition operations can generate an exception, unless you update the input to the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Noen senere gjenkjenning operasjoner kan generere et unntak med mindre du oppdaterer inndataene gjenkjenneren.

trans-unit.source: The stream containing the audio data.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten som inneholder lyd dataene.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> detects input that it can identify as speech.
trans-unit.target: Starter når den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> oppdager inndata som den kan identifisere som tale.

trans-unit.source: Each speech recognizer has an algorithm to distinguish between silence and speech.
trans-unit.target: Hver tale gjenkjenner har en algoritme å skille mellom stillhet og tale.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> performs a speech recognition operation, it raises the SpeechDetected event when its algorithm identifies the input as speech.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>utfører en operasjon for tale recognition den opphøyer SpeechDetected-hendelse når algoritmen identifiserer inndataene som tale.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs> object indicates location in the input stream where the recognizer detected speech.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A>for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs>objektet angir plassering i den inngående dataflyten der gjenkjenneren oppdaget tale.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> raises the SpeechDetected event before it raises any of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>, or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> events.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>viser SpeechDetected-hendelsen før den opphøyer noen av de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>, eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>hendelser.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: For more information see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon, kan du se den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>, og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a SpeechDetected delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en SpeechDetected representant, må du identifisere metoden som håndterer hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når det oppstår hendelsen, med mindre du fjerner representanten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelsesbehandlingen representanter [hendelser og representanter](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> has recognized a word or words that may be a component of multiple complete phrases in a grammar.
trans-unit.target: Starter når den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> gjenkjennes ord som kan være en komponent i flere fullført uttrykk i en grammatikk.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> generates numerous SpeechHypothesized events as it attempts to identify an input phrase.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>genererer flere SpeechHypothesized hendelser fordi den prøver å finne et uttrykk som inndata.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: You can access the text of partially recognized phrases in the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs> object in the handler for the SpeechHypothesized event.
trans-unit.target: Du har tilgang til teksten for delvis gjenkjent uttrykk i den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs>objektet i et behandlingsprogram for hendelsen SpeechHypothesized.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, handling these events is useful only for debugging.
trans-unit.target: Behandler disse hendelsene er vanligvis bare nyttig for feilsøking.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs> derives from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs>er avledet fra <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For more information see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> property and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon, kan du se den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>egenskapen og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>, og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a SpeechHypothesized delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en SpeechHypothesized representant, må du identifisere metoden som håndterer hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når det oppstår hendelsen, med mindre du fjerner representanten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelsesbehandlingen representanter [hendelser og representanter](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> receives input that does not match any of its loaded and enabled <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Starter når den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> mottar inndata som ikke samsvarer med noen av de innlastede og aktivert <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises this event if it determines that input does not match with sufficient confidence any of its loaded and enabled <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenneren forårsaket hendelsen hvis det avgjør at inndataene ikke samsvarer med tilstrekkelige konfidensnivået noen av de innlastede og aktivert <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekter.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> contains the rejected <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs>inneholder den avviste <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the handler for the SpeechRecognitionRejected event to retrieve recognition <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> that were rejected and their <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A> scores.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke et behandlingsprogram for hendelsen SpeechRecognitionRejected for å hente recognition <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>som ble avvist og deres <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A>resultater.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application is using a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance, you can modify the confidence level at which speech input is accepted or rejected with one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Hvis programmet bruker en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>forekomsten, kan du endre konfidensnivået ved som tale inndataene godkjennes eller avvises med én av de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: You can modify how the speech recognition responds to non-speech input using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre hvordan talegjenkjenning svarer på ikke--tale som er inndata ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>, og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a SpeechRecognitionRejected delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en SpeechRecognitionRejected representant, må du identifisere metoden som håndterer hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når det oppstår hendelsen, med mindre du fjerner representanten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelsesbehandlingen representanter [hendelser og representanter](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> receives input that matches any of its loaded and enabled <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Starter når den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> mottar inndata som samsvarer med noen av de innlastede og aktivert <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: You can initiate a recognition operation using the one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Du kan starte et recognition operasjonen med en av de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises the SpeechRecognized event if it determines that input matches one of its loaded <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects with a sufficient level of confidence to constitute recognition.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenneren viser SpeechRecognized-hendelsen hvis det avgjør at inndataene samsvarer med én av de innlastede <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekter med et tilstrekkelig konfidensnivået ved å sende recognition.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> contains the accepted <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs>inneholder den aksepterte <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handlers of SpeechRecognized events can obtain the recognized phrase as well as a list of recognition <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> with lower confidence scores.
trans-unit.target: Behandlingsprogrammer av SpeechRecognized hendelser kan få gjenkjent uttrykket som en liste over recognition <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>med lavere konfidensnivået resultater.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application is using a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance, you can modify the confidence level at which speech input is accepted or rejected with one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Hvis programmet bruker en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>forekomsten, kan du endre konfidensnivået ved som tale inndataene godkjennes eller avvises med én av de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: You can modify how the speech recognition responds to non-speech input using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre hvordan talegjenkjenning svarer på ikke--tale som er inndata ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>, og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer receives input that matches a grammar, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object can raise its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: Når gjenkjenneren mottar inndata som samsvarer med en grammatikk den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekt kan øke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>hendelsen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event is raised prior to the speech recognizer's SpeechRecognized event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektets <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>hendelsen starter før den tale gjenkjenner SpeechRecognized hendelsen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: Any tasks specific to a particular grammar should always be performed by a handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: Oppgaver som er spesifikke for en bestemt grammatikk må alltid utføres av et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>hendelsen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>

trans-unit.source: When you create a SpeechRecognized delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en SpeechRecognized representant, må du identifisere metoden som håndterer hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når det oppstår hendelsen, med mindre du fjerner representanten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelsesbehandlingen representanter [hendelser og representanter](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Unloads all <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> objects from the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner alle <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objekter fra gjenkjenneren.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is currently loading a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> asynchronously, this method waits until the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> is loaded, before it unloads all of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects from the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance.
trans-unit.target: Hvis gjenkjenneren lastes inn for øyeblikket en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>asynkront, denne metoden venter til den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>er lastet inn, før den fjernes alle den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekter fra den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>forekomsten.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: To unload a specific grammar, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil fjerne en bestemt grammatikk, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: Unloads a specified <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner et angitt <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objektet fra den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is running, applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du kjører gjenkjenneren, programmer må bruke <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>du vil stoppe den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>forekomsten før innlasting av utlasting av, aktivering eller deaktivering av en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To unload all <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Slik fjerner du alle <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektene, brukes den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The grammar object to unload.
trans-unit.target: Grammatikk-objektet til å fjerne.

trans-unit.source: Grammar is .
trans-unit.target: Grammaris .

trans-unit.source: The grammar is not loaded in this recognizer, or this recognizer is currently loading the grammar asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Grammatikk er ikke lastet inn i denne gjenkjenner, eller denne gjenkjenner er for øyeblikket grammatikk asynkron innlasting.

trans-unit.source: Updates the specified setting for the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> with the specified integer value.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer de angitte innstillingene for den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> med den angitte heltallsverdien.

trans-unit.source: With the exception of `PersistedBackgroundAdaptation`, property values set using the UpdateRecognizerSetting method remain in effect only for the current instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>, after which they revert to their default settings.
trans-unit.target: Med unntak av `PersistedBackgroundAdaptation`, egenskapsverdier angis ved å bruke metoden UpdateRecognizerSetting gjelder bare for den gjeldende forekomsten av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>, etter som de gå tilbake til standardinnstillingene.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> for descriptions of supported settings.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>for beskrivelser av støttede innstillinger.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the setting to update.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på innstillingen du vil oppdatere.

trans-unit.source: The new value for the setting.
trans-unit.target: Den nye verdien for innstillingen.

trans-unit.source: settingName is .
trans-unit.target: settingNameis .

trans-unit.source: settingName is the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: settingNameer en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: The recognizer does not have a setting by that name.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenneren har ikke en innstilling med dette navnet.

trans-unit.source: Updates the specified speech recognition engine setting with the specified string value.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer innstillingen angitte tale recognition motoren med den angitte strengverdien.

trans-unit.source: With the exception of `PersistedBackgroundAdaptation`, property values set using the UpdateRecognizerSetting method remain in effect only for the current instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>, after which they revert to their default settings.
trans-unit.target: Med unntak av `PersistedBackgroundAdaptation`, egenskapsverdier angis ved å bruke metoden UpdateRecognizerSetting gjelder bare for den gjeldende forekomsten av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>, etter som de gå tilbake til standardinnstillingene.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> for descriptions of supported settings.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>for beskrivelser av støttede innstillinger.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the setting to update.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på innstillingen du vil oppdatere.

trans-unit.source: The new value for the setting.
trans-unit.target: Den nye verdien for innstillingen.

trans-unit.source: settingName is .
trans-unit.target: settingNameis .

trans-unit.source: settingName is the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: settingNameer en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: The recognizer does not have a setting by that name.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenneren har ikke en innstilling med dette navnet.
